es: Has descansado y recuperado algo de salud
en: You have rested and regained some health

es: No hay nada en la caja
en: There is nothing in the box

es: Bebiste una pocion, recuperaste algo de vida
en: You drank a potion, you recovered some life

es: Hecho por Deybis Melendez para Godot Wild Jam #2
en: Made by Deybis Melendez for Godot Wild Jam #2

es: El rey te ha encargado encontrar el anillo de su esposa, que se le ha caido en un pozo maldito, recuperalo y vive.
en: The king has commissioned you to find his wife's ring, which has fallen into a cursed pit, retrieve it and live.

es: Has conseguido el anillo, de igual manera el Rey mando a ejecutarte, fin.
en: You have obtained the ring, in the same way the King ordered to execute you, order.

es: Has muerto, tal vez si lo intentas de nuevo logres conseguir el anillo.
en: You've died, maybe if you try again you'll get the ring.
